posts.post_content:
I only want the horizontal cards.   The game poses are what I am after first.   Ungraded prefered, low grade, backs are not an issue, fronts need to be as nice as possible.  Please send me scans and prices to [url]pup6913@hotmail.com[/url].  

 If you want me to make an offer I wont because it never seems to work well for me to price your item that you already have priced.

I already have #44 Trying to Catch Him Napping
